name: Einholen - The First Road Trip
description:
The game is very loosely based on Bertha Benz's first road trip through Germany in 1888.
It is basically an endless arcade racer. Although it is possible to arrive at the historically accurate destination.

This game was developed during the "Historically Accurate Game Jam 5" and is obviously inspired by Outrun 1986.

Use Arrow Keys to control the automobile

Assets I didn't make myself:
https://www.turbosquid.com/3d-models/3d-street-light-1445090
https://free3d.com/3d-model/low-poly-cow-75171.html
https://www.turbosquid.com/3d-models/horse-3d-model-1449571

Lively Lumpsucker by Kevin MacLeod
